scripts.sync-workshops-stacks: cp cfn/java-ai-agents-stack.yaml ../../java-ai-agents/static/ && cp cfn/java-on-eks-stack.yaml ../../java-on-amazon-eks/static/ && cp cfn/unicornstore-stack.yaml ../../java-on-aws-immersion-day/static/ && cp cfn/spring-ai-stack.yaml ../../java-spring-ai-agents/static/

scripts.generate-sync-all: npm run generate-unicornstore-stack && npm run generate-java-on-eks-stack && npm run generate-java-ai-agents-stack && npm run generate-ide-stack && npm run generate-ide-gitea-stack && npm run generate-spring-ai-stack && npm run sync-workshops-stacks && npm run sync-workshops-policy
